short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides users with a set of functionalities similar to DevTools but targeting a non-technical audience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageAudit enables users to benefit from the powerful features offered to developers via DevTools in a simple and intuitive extension interface. 

- Simulate a desktop, tablet or mobile screen size.
- Inspect individual components on the current website.
- Enter design mode and directly edit the website's text.
- Simulate different internet speeds.
- Manage cache and cookies.
